It is with sadness that we confirm the passing of one of our scholars, Aveanna Propst. She was involved in a fatal incident at Concord Mills Mall on Saturday, December 28. She was a talented young lady and was loved by many. As a school family, our hearts are broken but we ache even more for Aveanna's family. We send our warmest thoughts and wishing them comfort during this time.

We, as a school family, are making plans to honor Aveanna's life in the near future. However, we are respecting her family's request for privacy during this difficult time.

In the meantime, we have counseling resources available to support our students and team members.

So many of you have asked to support and help. On behalf of her family (biological and school) and loved ones, we thank you and appreciate your thoughtfulness. If you would like to support the family, please contact us at info@aceacademycharter.org.

#rememberingaveanna #youACEdit
